creator: holz@fiz-chemie.de
text:
org.apache.slide.webdav.util.PropertyRetrieverImpl.getAllPropertiesOfObject
will raise a exception:

AccessDeniedException: Access denied on /files/vsc/de/vs/16/doc/guide/Readme.txt
by user /users/holz for action /actions/manage

if the user has read right but no manage rights and want to read all
properties.The exception is thrown, when slide is trying to 
read DAV::acl. 

I guess you should remove the negation in line 498, rev 1.24: 
if(! orgache.slide.util.Configuration.useIntegratedSecurity() &&
   ^^
Maybe getAllPropertiesOfObject should ignore AccessDeniedExceptions
always.
*** Bug 12512 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: cmlenz@apache.org

text:

Patch to create new Propstat element with 403 status
